oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Israel Putnam's Major-General commission
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Revolutions; Generals
Putnam, Israel, 1718-1790
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Israel Putnam (January 7, 1718 – May 29, 1790) was an American army general and Freemason who fought at the Battle of Bunker Hill (1775) during the American Revolutionary War (1775–1783). He was popularly known as "Old Put."
